page.title: 15Public Buildings
page.content: The{church}belongs to the Church of Scotland. About 30 children go to the Sunday School and about 15-30 people go to church services. There is no minister living in Aith anymore so the minister from Walls, a village near by, takes the services. The{school}is a Junior High.It was opened in the summer of 1982. It has a swimming pool, a multi-court, football and hockey pitches. There are 16 teachers including visiting ones. There are 76 primary pupils and 64 secondary. The{hall}was built in 1927 but after 52 years it had to be rebuilt. The rebuilding was finished in April 1982. Now the hall is in use regulary for badminton, the S.W.R.I., the R.N.L.I., weddings, etc.
